players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Bob: "Alice, I investigated you and found you are the mafia. Vote for me."
Diana: "Bob, if you are detective, why didn't you investigate Charlie? Alice is innocent."
Diana: "Bob, if you are detective, you should have investigated Charlie. Alice is innocent."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
